types_of_data_collected: Account Information (name, contact information, account credentials, date of birth, payment information, transaction history)
methods_of_collection: Directly from users when creating an account
data_usage: To provide, analyze, and maintain Services; to improve and develop Services; to communicate with users; to prevent fraud and illegal activity; to comply with legal obligations and protect rights and safety
third_party_disclosure: Vendors and service providers; business transfer counterparties; government authorities or other third parties (when legally required or for safety/security); affiliates; business account administrators (for enterprise accounts)
retention_period: Only as long as needed to provide Services or for other legitimate business purposes (resolving disputes, safety and security, legal compliance); depends on processing purpose, amount/nature/sensitivity of information, risk of harm, and legal requirements

types_of_data_collected: User Content (prompts, uploaded files, images, audio)
methods_of_collection: Directly from users as input to Services
data_usage: To provide, analyze, and maintain Services (e.g., respond to questions); to improve and develop Services and conduct research (e.g., train models); to prevent fraud and illegal activity; to comply with legal obligations and protect rights and safety
third_party_disclosure: Vendors and service providers; business transfer counterparties; government authorities or other third parties (when legally required or for safety/security); affiliates; business account administrators (for enterprise accounts); other users and third parties when user chooses to share (e.g., shared links, custom actions, third-party applications)
retention_period: Only as long as needed to provide Services or for other legitimate business purposes; temporary chats kept up to 30 days for safety purposes; users can control retention through settings

types_of_data_collected: Communication Information (name, contact information, message contents)
methods_of_collection: Directly from users when communicating via email or social media
data_usage: To provide, analyze, and maintain Services; to improve and develop Services; to communicate with users; to prevent fraud and illegal activity; to comply with legal obligations and protect rights and safety
third_party_disclosure: Vendors and service providers; business transfer counterparties; government authorities or other third parties (when legally required or for safety/security); affiliates
retention_period: Only as long as needed to provide Services or for other legitimate business purposes (resolving disputes, safety and security, legal compliance)

types_of_data_collected: Other Information You Provide (information from events, surveys, identity/age verification)
methods_of_collection: Directly from users during participation in events/surveys or identity verification
data_usage: To provide, analyze, and maintain Services; to improve and develop Services; to communicate with users; to prevent fraud and illegal activity; to comply with legal obligations and protect rights and safety
third_party_disclosure: Vendors and service providers; business transfer counterparties; government authorities or other third parties (when legally required or for safety/security); affiliates
retention_period: Only as long as needed to provide Services or for other legitimate business purposes (resolving disputes, safety and security, legal compliance)

types_of_data_collected: Log Data (IP address, browser type and settings, date and time of requests, interaction data)
methods_of_collection: Automatically collected from browser or device when using Services
data_usage: To provide, analyze, and maintain Services; to improve and develop Services and conduct research; to prevent fraud and illegal activity; to comply with legal obligations and protect rights and safety
third_party_disclosure: Vendors and service providers; business transfer counterparties; government authorities or other third parties (when legally required or for safety/security); affiliates
retention_period: Only as long as needed to provide Services or for other legitimate business purposes (resolving disputes, safety and security, legal compliance)

types_of_data_collected: Usage Data (types of content viewed/engaged with, features used, actions taken, time zone, country, dates/times of access, user agent, device type, computer connection)
methods_of_collection: Automatically collected during use of Services
data_usage: To provide, analyze, and maintain Services; to improve and develop Services and conduct research; to prevent fraud and illegal activity; to comply with legal obligations and protect rights and safety
third_party_disclosure: Vendors and service providers; business transfer counterparties; government authorities or other third parties (when legally required or for safety/security); affiliates
retention_period: Only as long as needed to provide Services or for other legitimate business purposes (resolving disputes, safety and security, legal compliance)

types_of_data_collected: Device Information (device name, operating system, device identifiers, browser)
methods_of_collection: Automatically collected from device when accessing Services
data_usage: To provide, analyze, and maintain Services; to improve and develop Services; to prevent fraud and illegal activity; to comply with legal obligations and protect rights and safety
third_party_disclosure: Vendors and service providers; business transfer counterparties; government authorities or other third parties (when legally required or for safety/security); affiliates
retention_period: Only as long as needed to provide Services or for other legitimate business purposes (resolving disputes, safety and security, legal compliance)

types_of_data_collected: Location Information (general area from IP address, precise location from GPS if user chooses)
methods_of_collection: Indirectly determined from IP address; directly from device GPS if user provides permission
data_usage: Security reasons (e.g., detecting unusual login activity); to improve product experience (e.g., provide more accurate responses)
third_party_disclosure: Vendors and service providers; business transfer counterparties; government authorities or other third parties (when legally required or for safety/security); affiliates
retention_period: Only as long as needed to provide Services or for other legitimate business purposes (resolving disputes, safety and security, legal compliance)

types_of_data_collected: Cookie Data (information stored via cookies and similar technologies, including preferences)
methods_of_collection: Indirectly through cookies and similar technologies
data_usage: To operate and administer Services; to improve user experience; to maintain preferences across browsing sessions
third_party_disclosure: Vendors and service providers; business transfer counterparties; government authorities or other third parties (when legally required or for safety/security); affiliates
retention_period: Only as long as needed to provide Services or for other legitimate business purposes

types_of_data_collected: Information from Security Partners (fraud and abuse prevention data)
data_usage: To prevent fraud, abuse, and other security threats to Services
third_party_disclosure: Vendors and service providers; business transfer counterparties; government authorities or other third parties (when legally required or for safety/security); affiliates
retention_period: Only as long as needed to provide Services or for other legitimate business purposes (resolving disputes, safety and security, legal compliance)

types_of_data_collected: Marketing Information (information about potential business customers)
data_usage: To identify and communicate with potential customers of business services
third_party_disclosure: Vendors and service providers; business transfer counterparties; government authorities or other third parties (when legally required or for safety/security); affiliates
retention_period: Only as long as needed to provide Services or for other legitimate business purposes

types_of_data_collected: Publicly Available Information (information from the internet)
methods_of_collection: Collected from publicly available sources on the internet
data_usage: To develop models that power Services

types_of_data_collected: De-identified or Aggregated Data (Personal Data that no longer identifies individuals)
methods_of_collection: Derived from Personal Data through aggregation or de-identification processes
data_usage: To analyze how Services are used; to improve and add features to Services; to conduct research
retention_period: Maintained in de-identified form; not re-identified unless required by law
